Are you tired of clicking on a YouTube video and realizing it's in Russian without subtitles? Look no further than "RuBlocker". Our easy-to-use Chrome extension provides the percentage of Russian audio language in YouTube videos, so you can determine if it's worth watching before you click play.

With "RuBlocker", you'll never waste your time watching a video in a language you don't understand again. Our extension is simple to install and use - just install it and browse YouTube as usual. The percentage of Russian audio language will appear right next to the video title, making it easy to decide if the video is right for you. Download "RuBlocker" today and make your YouTube browsing experience more efficient!
